name: Smartphone
description: Latest smartphone featuring a high-resolution display, powerful processor, and advanced camera system.

name: Laptop
description: Sleek laptop equipped with an Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a fast SSD for seamless performance.

name: Tablet
description: Portable tablet with a vibrant touchscreen, perfect for both productivity and entertainment.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact wireless earbuds offering crisp sound quality, active noise cancellation, and long battery life.

name: Smartwatch
description: Modern smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and customizable watch faces.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker delivering robust bass, crisp audio, and a water-resistant design.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-generation gaming console featuring immersive graphics and a vast library of games.

name: Digital Camera
description: High-resolution digital camera with advanced autofocus and optical zoom capabilities.

name: Drone
description: Compact drone equipped with an HD camera, offering stable flight and real-time video transmission.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Durable external hard drive offering ample storage capacity and fast data transfer speeds.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Ergonomic mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and responsive tactile feedback.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: Precision gaming mouse featuring adjustable DPI settings and programmable buttons.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR headset with a high-resolution display for an unparalleled virtual reality experience.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Versatile USB-C hub featuring multiple ports for seamless connectivity with various devices.

name: Portable Charger
description: High-capacity portable charger with fast charging capabilities and support for multiple devices.

name: LED Monitor
description: Ultra-thin LED monitor with full HD resolution, vibrant colors, and adjustable ergonomics.

name: Graphics Card
description: High-performance graphics card designed for demanding gaming and creative workloads.

name: Motherboard
description: Robust motherboard supporting the latest processors and featuring multiple expansion slots.

name: CPU
description: Powerful multi-core CPU ideal for heavy computing tasks, gaming, and professional applications.

description: High-speed RAM modules designed for smooth multitasking and enhanced system performance.
